name: VisitsLocationService
description: Certain configurations of the Visits Location Service are not optimal.

states.name: #CLActivityType.other!enumelt (active)
states.message: other, the default Visits Location Service configuration, is nonoptimal.

states.name: #CLActivityType.otherNavigation!enumelt (active)
states.message: otherNavigation is very nonoptimal, especially when used in the background.
